title: PSA: chase kills less, farm more
body:
You'll do better in game, I promise.

This PSA is meant for those who are genuinely trying to do better, and is mainly meant for bronze players. fight your instinct to try and kill, and just turn around, farm and learn to sustain properly in lane. If you can guarantee a kill, good, but it isn't worth dying over. You dying puts your whole team behind, you killing puts you ahead of your team mates slightly. Even at 0/0/0 if you have great CS and good teamwork skills to take dragon... you'll still be a threat come mid game (and you won't end the game 0/0/0, I promise,opportunities will come up). TBH, just put a sticker over the spot where it tells you your KDA.

I'm a scrub, but trust me on this, next time your gut tells you to dive, chase or do something else that is stupid... don't. Turn around and walk away.

watch a few spectator games, and watch your favorite lane and just how often they walk away from engages... it will surprise you
